text: Hans "Hansi" Last (17 April 1929 - 9 June 2015), better known by his stage name James Last, was a German composer and big band leader. His "happy music" sold over 100 million albums. He worked in mainly his native Germany and the United Kingdom. Last was born in Bremen. He was married twice and had two children. Last died of an illness on 9 June 2015 in Palm Beach, Florida, United States. He was 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Bandleaders Category:German singer- songwriters Category:Jazz composers Category:People from Bremen (state) Category:20th-century German composers Category:21st-century German composers
title: James Last
